content: You can create a template from a room in the Room section

comment.text: This translation key describes the text that will be displayed when creating a template from an empty room in the Room section. It explains how to proceed with the process and provides context for users navigating the Room templates page.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the translation "يمكنكم إنشاء قالب من غرفة موجودة ضمن قسم الغرف" is a bit wordy and formal for typical user interface text. A more natural and concise translation would improve user experience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: يمكنك إنشاء قالب من غرفة في قسم الغرف.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Otaq bölməsində otaqdan şablon yarada bilərsiniz" is not the most natural or accurate rendering of "You can create a template from a room in the Room section." It's overly literal and a bit clunky. 'Room section' is also not properly conveyed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Yenə bir otaqdan şablon yaratmaq üçün Otaqlar bölməsinə keçin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the repeated use of 'otaq' (room) makes the sentence sound awkward in Azerbaijani. Avoiding repetition enhances readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Yenə bir otaqdan şablon yaratmaq üçün Otaqlar bölməsinə keçin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'a partir de una sala' sounds slightly awkward. A more natural translation would be 'desde una sala'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Puede crear una plantilla desde una sala en la sección Salas

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Vous pouvez créer un modèle à partir d'une salle dans la section Salle' is overly literal and slightly awkward. 'Salle' is repeated unnecessarily.  A more natural translation would imply the section is also about rooms.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vous pouvez créer un modèle à partir d'une pièce dans la section Pièces.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation 'Դուք կարող եք սենյակից ստեղծել կաղապար «Սենյակներ» բաժնում։' is a literal translation but slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing would be 'Դուք կարող եք ստեղծել կաղապար սենյակից՝ «Սենյակներ» բաժնում։' or 'Դուք կարող եք սենյակից ստեղծել կաղապար, «Սենյակներ» բաժնում։'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Դուք կարող եք ստեղծել կաղապար սենյակից՝ «Սենյակներ» բաժնում։

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is technically correct but sounds unnatural in Japanese. The phrasing 'ルームセクションのルームから' is redundant. 'ルームセクション' already implies rooms.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ルームセクションからテンプレートを作成できます

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ທ່ານສາມາດສ້າງແມ່ແບບຈາກຫ້ອງໃນພື້ນທີ່ຫ້ອງໄດ້' is slightly awkward. 'ພື້ນທີ່ຫ້ອງ' literally translates to 'room area' which is redundant. The English 'Room section' implies a specific area or tab within a system, not just the physical space.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ທ່ານສາມາດສ້າງແມ່ແບບຈາກຫ້ອງໃນສ່ວນຫ້ອງໄດ້

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Kamer sectie' is slightly awkward. While technically correct, 'Kamers' (plural) would be more natural in this context, as users would typically create templates from multiple rooms.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: U kunt een sjabloon maken van een kamer in de Kamers sectie

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Pode criar um templates a partir de uma sala na secção Sala' is not a direct and accurate translation of 'You can create a template from a room in the Room section'. The use of 'templates' is incorrect; it should be 'modelo' or 'template' (loanword). The repetition of 'Sala' is also awkward.  'secção Sala' could be simplified to just 'Sala'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pode criar um modelo a partir de uma sala na seção Sala.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'templates' is misspelled. It should be 'template' or 'modelo'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: modelo or template

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Você pode criar um modelo de uma sala na seção Sala' is too literal and somewhat awkward in Portuguese. 'Sala' appears twice, which isn't ideal. A better phrasing would focus on creating a template *based on* a room.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Você pode criar um modelo a partir de uma sala na seção Quartos.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Romanian translation "Puteți crea șablonul de sală în secțiunea Sală" is too literal and doesn't flow naturally. 'Șablonul de sală' is awkward. It directly translates 'template of room'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Puteți crea un șablon din camera din secțiunea Sală.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'sală' is repeated and sounds unnatural. The original English uses 'room' and 'Room' to distinguish between the generic and specific section.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Puteți crea un șablon dintr-o cameră din secțiunea 'Sală'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ඔබ' (oba) which means 'you' is unnecessary and can be removed. It's overly formal and not needed in this context.  The sentence flows better without it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: කාමරයකින් අච්චුවක් නිර්මාණය කළ හැකිය.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'අච්චුවක්' is technically correct, 'වීදියක්' is more commonly used when describing templates in a room setting, although 'අච්චුවක්' is acceptable. Using the more common term will improve naturalness.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: කාමරයකින් වීදියක් නිර්මාණය කළ හැකිය.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Predlogo lahko ustvarite iz sobe v razdelku Soba' is slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing would be 'Predlogo lahko ustvarite iz sobe v odseku Soba' or 'Ustvarite predlogo iz sobe v razdelku Soba'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ustvarite predlogo iz sobe v razdelku Soba

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Можете креирати шаблон из собе у одељку Собе' is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'You can create a template from a room in the Room section'. 'Kreirati' is a more formal word than is typically used in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Можете направити шаблон из собе у одељку 'Соби'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Соби' should be in single quotes to denote it's a section name.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Можете направити шаблон из собе у одељку 'Соби'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation uses lowercase for 'Sobe' which should be capitalized as it is a section name.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Možete kreirati šablon iz sobe u odeljku Sobe.
